# With fear of getting banned, posting a nice helpful must have software offer for you! :-)

Extract Any Mail Pro (tm) is a helpful software that can gather all emails from inbox, sent, draft, junk or any other folder of your own email. Just run it, configure your email and start task. It will present you a list with all emails extracted from To, BCC, CC, Subject and body field. I know this is not a big software but you really need every bit.
***
**The software regular price is $25. But here is a coupon code for you to get the software for only $10 lifetime.**  
Here goes the order link  
https://secure.avangate.com/order/checkout.php?PRODS=4715886&QTY=1&CART=1&CARD=1&COUPON=LETEAM
